item.text: With regard to spiritual gifts, brothers and sisters, I do not want you to be uninformed.

You <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> you <st data-num="1510">were</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">pagans</st> you were often <st data-num="520">led astray</st> <st data-num="4314">by</st> <st data-num="880" class="">speechless</st> <st data-num="1497" class="">idols</st>, <st data-num="5613" class="">however</st> you were <st data-num="71" class="">led</st>.
So I want you to understand that no one speaking by the Spirit of God says, “Jesus is cursed,” and no one can say, “Jesus is Lord,” except by the Holy Spirit.
Now there are different gifts, but the same Spirit.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1243" class="">different</st> <st data-num="1248" class="">ministries</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1243" class="">different</st> <st data-num="1755" class="">results</st>, <st data-num="1161">but</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> who <st data-num="1754" class="">produces</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of them <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st>.

To <st data-num="1538">each person</st> the <st data-num="5321" class="">manifestation</st> of the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> is <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="4851" class="">benefit</st> of all.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3739">one person</st> is <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> of <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> of <st data-num="1108" class="">knowledge</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>,

to <st data-num="2087">another</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> <st data-num="5486" class="">gifts</st> of <st data-num="2386" class="">healing</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>,

to <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> <st data-num="1755" class="">performance</st> of <st data-num="1411" class="">miracles</st>, to <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> <st data-num="4394" class="">prophecy</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> <st data-num="1253" class="">discernment</st> of <st data-num="4151" class="">spirits</st>, to <st data-num="2087" class="">another</st> <st data-num="2087" class="">different</st> <st data-num="1085" class="">kinds</st> of <st data-num="1100" class="">tongues</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> the <st data-num="2058" class="">interpretation</st> of <st data-num="1100" class="">tongues</st>.
It is one and the same Spirit, distributing as he decides to each person, who produces all these things.
For just as the body is one and yet has many members, and all the members of the body—though many—are one body, so too is Christ.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> were <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>. <st data-num="1535" class="">Whether</st> <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1672" class="">Greeks</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1658" class="">free</st>, we were <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4222">made to drink</st> of the <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st><st data-num="2532"> in fact</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> a <st data-num="1520" class="">single</st> <st data-num="3196" class="">member</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st>.

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> the <st data-num="4228" class="">foot</st> <st data-num="3004">says</st>, “<st data-num="3754">Since</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> a <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st>, I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1537">part of</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>,” it does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> lose its membership <st data-num="1537">in</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> <st data-num="3844">because of</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="3775" class="">ear</st> <st data-num="3004">says</st>, “<st data-num="3754">Since</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> an <st data-num="3788" class="">eye</st>, I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1537">part of</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>,” it does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> lose its membership in the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> <st data-num="3844">because of</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st>.

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> were an <st data-num="3788" class="">eye</st>, <st data-num="4226" class="">what</st> part would do the <st data-num="189" class="">hearing</st>? <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> were an <st data-num="189" class="">ear</st>, <st data-num="4226">what</st> part would exercise the <st data-num="3750">sense of smell</st>?

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3750">as a matter of fact</st>, <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="5087" class="">placed</st> <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st> of the <st data-num="3196" class="">members</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> he <st data-num="2309" class="">decided</st>.

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> they <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="1520">same</st> <st data-num="3196" class="">member</st>, <st data-num="4226" class="">where</st> would the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> be?

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> there are <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="3196" class="">members</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>.

The <st data-num="3788" class="">eye</st> <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="3004">say</st> to the <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st>, “I <st data-num="2192" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">need</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,” <st data-num="2228">nor</st> in <st data-num="3825" class="">turn</st> can the <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> say to the <st data-num="4228" class="">foot</st>, “I <st data-num="2192">do</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">need</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.”

<st data-num="235 3123">On the contrary</st>, those <st data-num="3196" class="">members</st> that <st data-num="1380" class="">seem</st> to <st data-num="5225">be</st> <st data-num="772" class="">weaker</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="316" class="">essential</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3739 4983">those members</st> we <st data-num="1380" class="">consider</st> <st data-num="820">less honorable</st> we <st data-num="4060" class="">clothe</st> with <st data-num="4053" class="">greater</st> <st data-num="5092" class="">honor</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2157" class="">unpresentable</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">members</st> are <st data-num="4053" class="">clothed</st> with <st data-num="809" class="">dignity</st>,<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2158">presentable members</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">need</st> this. <st data-num="235" class="">Instead</st>, <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="4786" class="">blended together</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>, <st data-num="1325" class="">giving</st> <st data-num="4053" class="">greater</st> <st data-num="5092" class="">honor</st> to the <st data-num="5302">lesser member</st>,

<st data-num="2443">so that</st> there may <st data-num="1510">be</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4978" class="">division</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="3196" class="">members</st> may have <st data-num="846">mutual</st> <st data-num="3309" class="">concern</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st>.
If one member suffers, everyone suffers with it. If a member is honored, all rejoice with it.
Now you are Christ’s body, and each of you is a member of it.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="5087" class="">placed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> <st data-num="4413">first</st> <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st>, <st data-num="1208" class="">second</st> <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st>, <st data-num="5154" class="">third</st> <st data-num="1320" class="">teachers</st>, <st data-num="1899" class="">then</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">miracles</st>, <st data-num="5486" class="">gifts</st> of <st data-num="2386" class="">healing</st>, <st data-num="484" class="">helps</st>, gifts of <st data-num="2941" class="">leadership</st>, different <st data-num="1085" class="">kinds</st> of <st data-num="1100" class="">tongues</st>.

<st data-num="3361" class="">Not</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> are <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st>, are they? <st data-num="3361" class="">Not</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> are <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st>, are they? <st data-num="3361" class="">Not</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> are <st data-num="1320" class="">teachers</st>, are they? <st data-num="3361" class="">Not</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1411">perform miracles</st>, do they?

<st data-num="3361" class="">Not</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="5486" class="">gifts</st> of <st data-num="2386" class="">healing</st>, do they? <st data-num="3361" class="">Not</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> in <st data-num="1100" class="">tongues</st>, do they? <st data-num="3361" class="">Not</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1329" class="">interpret</st>, do they?<n id="1" />

But you should be eager for the greater gifts.

And now I will show you a way that is beyond comparison.
